summary: Drug misuse—using illicit drugs or misusing prescription drugs—is a serious public health issue in the United States. National rates of drug misuse rose from 15% in 2003 to 19% in 2018. We are adding drug misuse to our High Risk List in 2021 to encourage progress. Our High Risk List covers areas in need of transformation, or at high risk from fraud, waste, abuse, and...
title: Drug Misuse: Sustained National Efforts Are Necessary for Prevention, Response, and Recovery
